links.title: Apple Pay reportedly has 127M users, is supported by 2700+ banks
links.description: Apple said during recent earnings calls that the number of active Apple Pay users had doubled year-on-year, with transactions more than tripling - but didn't reveal any numbers. Loup Ventures has today published new estimates, suggesting that there are now 127M active Apple Pay users globally, up from 62M a year ago.

links.title: Stock Market Could Be Tested Tomorrow, Plus Why Tesla May Be Cheap At Current Levels
links.description: The stock market just continues to bounce around, and the trend is now distinctly lower. The market has been unable to hold its gains late in the day, in what is becoming a trend. The S&P 500 had been as high as 2,730 intraday, to finish the day flat at 2,703.

messages.body:
Apple's HomePod Is No Amazon Echo-Killer, But It Doesn't Need to Be

$AAPL $AMZN 

https://www.thestreet.com/story/14497936/1/apple-homepod-not-an-amazon-echo-killer.html

links.title: Apple's HomePod is no Amazon Echo-killer, but it doesn't need to be
links.description: Apple's ( AAPL) $349 HomePod isn't a direct rival to sub-$150 home speakers powered by Amazon.com's ( AMZN) Alexa or Alphabet's ( GOOGL) Google Assistant. That's both its biggest weakness and its biggest strength.
